name: Virtua Racing Demake
description:
Technical preview of Virtua Racing port to pico-8 fantasy console.

How to play:

  • left/right: steering
  • up: accelerate
  • button O: change point of view
  • button X: back to title screen (when race over)

Features:

  • full 3d mode
  • 2 tracks
  • single player mode
  • arcade driving physics

Work in progress:

  • Brakes ;)
  • Track timing
  • NPC AI
  • Collisions

3D assets are from the Megadrive edition - copyright their respective owner.
